StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetStandardofE.ect]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @MonthBeginDate date.me AS
--- use decimals for # interviews rather than integers DECLARE @TC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @AC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @OT_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @HV_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2)
SET @TC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(TC_INTERVIEWS) FROM RSS_ACTIVITY, ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RSS_ACTIVITY.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSS_ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate))
SET @AC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(AC_INTERVIEWS) FROM RSS_ACTIVITY, ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RSS_ACTIVITY.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSS_ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate))
SET @OT_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(OT_INTERVIEWS) FROM RSS_ACTIVITY, ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RSS_ACTIVITY.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSS_ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate))
SET @HV_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(HV_INTERVIEWS) FROM RSS_ACTIVITY, ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RSS_ACTIVITY.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSS_ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate))
SELECT SOE_TC = CASE WHEN @TC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(SUM(RA.TCS)/ @TC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, SOE_OT = CASE WHEN @OT_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.OTS) / @OT_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END, SOE_AC = CASE WHEN @AC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.ACS) / @AC_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END, SOE_HV = CASE WHEN @HV_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.HVS) / @HV_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END FROM RSS_ACTIVITY RA INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate)
